_sText:
THIS MAP CAN BE PLAY LIKE ANY DE_....(bomb/diffuse map) you have the choice to add VIP MOD...not an obligation!!!!!

FOR MORE SCREENSHOTS : 
http://m4ppeu.site.voila.fr/photos/as_de_capc4naveral/album/as_de_capc4naveral.html
or
http://ankh.heroku.com/maps


IMPORTANT!!! i update the file the 1st one i post got textures bug due to a wrong bspzip application and i forgot to add the shuttle model to it....redownload it if the textures won'T apear correctly or if you ain'T see any shuttle on the launch pad when you spawn T
i'm sorry about it! this tip is only for the 19th first downloader!!!




1st mod - BOMB DEFUSE with normal CSS configuration

2nd mod - BOMB DEFUSE + VIP ASSASSINATION with metapluggins and VIP pluggin (downloaded at www.punkassfraggers.com)



the terrorist try to kill the VIP, before he reach the evacuation zones 

(1st evacuation zone's located at the Terrorsit starting point)

(2nd evacuation zone'S located in the SAS but CT's need to activate
the computer in the tower to turn the emergency shuttle launch protocol for
unlocking the SAS evacuation door...be quick and accurate!)


(to activate the shuttle use the computer inside the tower) you'll make the bomb target on the top of the sas disapear and create a chance for the vip to take the shuttle if he want to evacuate by there)

T's can bomb shuttles
ALL SHUTTLE TEXTURES WAS DOWNLOADED ON GOOGLE (special thx for them and to VALVE !!! ) 

I build it in 1 month so don't be to hard!

***FPS was tested at 20 players with 7900gtx 1 or 2gig/ram (p4 3.2 and higher)

If you got laggy...slowing by the door or mdl....7 tips

- play it on a dedicated server!!!!!!!!!
-reboot!!!
-play without all pluggins ( i'm not talking about VIP MOD)but all other thing like mp3...sound....ect....WC3 (DISABLE IT)
-be sure no one's downloading or uploading on the server
-buy another connection, gfx card or comp ;P

-play whitout HDR
-r_skybox 0 

DON'T USE COSTUM MODELS I MADE PLZ...it's my property and if you wana use it you might ask my authorisation...i hope you will respect it
